item.description:
Let's join Merrimack Valley Singles for Winterfest:

Come Celebrate the 9th Annual Winterfest
Last year we saw the fireworks while it was snowing outside, it was really fun.
As Lowla says: "Don't Hibernate, Come Celebrate".
Please note: This schedule of activities is subject to change. Please check back for event updates, including fees, times, dates, and locations. The times for the music events appear to conflict but this is how it os listed on their website. I will update when I see the listings in the newspaper.

Let's plan to meet at 4:45 PM. Club Celsius is a large tent set up for this event. Let's meet at the entrance on the side where the dogsled races are held. It may be crowded but should still be light out. If you want my cell number please email me using the contact the organizer link.

12:00 pm -7:00 pm DESTINATION WORLD: DOWNTOWN WINTER STROLL
Downtown Lowell invites you to shop, eat, and enjoy live entertainment at a variety of locales around town. Vote for your favorite cookie at Winterfest’s Downtown Cookie Competition or take part in the time-honored Chinese Lantern Festival at the ALL Arts Gallery. Stop by Lowell’s many museums, art galleries, shops, restaurants, and cafes!

5:00 pm -7:00 pm
LIVE MUSIC BY THE LISA LOVE EXPERIENCE
Location: Club Celsius
All Ages, No Cover Charge
7:00 pm -11:00 pm

WINTERFEST FIREWORKS EXTRAVAGANZA —Tsongas Arena
7:30-11:00 pm

LIVE MUSIC BY THE JOSHUA TREE (Hear the nation's #1 U2 Tribute Band!) Location: Club Celsius
Admission 21+. Cover Charge of $5

http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: Lowell Winterfest 2009 - Saturday Session
